Author: Farouk Friha
Summary: This PowerShell Workflow Runbook connects to Azure using an Automation Run As account, retrieves the power status of Azure V2 VMs and turns off / on  in parallel those that are turned on / off. You can attach a recurring schedule to this runbook to run it at a specific time.
Title: (Deprecated) Stop / Start all or only tagged Azure VMs in parallel
UserTags: Azure Automation, Microsoft Azure Virtual Machines, PowerShell Workflow Runbook
